title: Bière & Code Paris
description: A welcoming space for developers, engineers, and tech enthusiasts to explore ideas, share knowledge, and connect over great conversation and craft beer.

monthly.title: Monthly Meetups
monthly.description: Join us every month for an evening of tech talks, demos, and networking. Whether you're a seasoned developer or just starting out, you'll find engaging conversations and a supportive community.

updates.title: Community Updates
updates.description: Stay informed about upcoming events, member projects, and highlights from our gatherings. Get insights into what our community is building and learning.

community.title: Open to All
community.description: We believe the best conversations happen when diverse perspectives come together. All experience levels, backgrounds, and interests are welcome at our table.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Meet the team behind Bière & Code Paris.

raph.bio: Senior Developer Evangelist at Defang and a serial entrepreneur with deep roots in the startup ecosystem. As the founder of Ephemere Creative and Tembo Tech, Raph combines technical expertise with a passion for community building and mentorship, bridging the gap between complex cloud technologies and the developers who use them.

miguel.bio: Senior Software Engineer at Gencove (NYC), specializing in high-scale Cloud Infrastructure and Backend systems for genomic analysis. An active open-source contributor and former digital nomad, Miguel brings a global perspective and strong entrepreneurial background to engineering, having built and launched successful products across multiple platforms.
